mapper.insert: insert into reservation values (seq_rno.nextval, #{mid}, #{fno}, to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') || '' || #{startTime},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') || '' || #{endTime},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{status})
mapper.select: select count(*) use_count, floor, room_count from reservation r, feeding_room f where r.fno = f.fno and start_time = to_date(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') || '' || #{start_time}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and department_store = #{department_store} and status = 0 group by floor, room_count order by floor
select mid, start_time, department_store, floor from reservation r, feeding_room f where r.fno = f.fno and mid = #{userId} and status = '0'
mapper.update: update reservation set fno = #{fno}, start_time = to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') || '' || #{startTime},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), end_time = to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') || '' || #{endTime},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') where mid = #{mid} and status = 0
update reservation set status = 1 where MID = #{userId} and status =0
